author: stack
msg: HBASE-3845 data loss because lastSeqWritten can miss memstore edits

author: not
msg: ARIES-713 Deliver a new ScheduledExecutorService class, and support, that allows us to switch between ScheduledExecutorServices in the service registry and default ones to allow better integration into server threading environments.
Note it is a very bad idea for the BlueprintExtender and teh BlueprintEventDispatcher to use the same thread pool.

author: mikemccand
msg: move flush policy default into IWC, matching other configs

msg: Use latest version of H2, to solve the BLOB skip performance problem.
